content: Black Loong is an optional secret Yaoguai King boss fight that you can encounter in Chapter 2 of Black Myth Wukong. Hidden beyond a waterfall of sand in the Fright Cliff, you won't be able to encounter this boss until you obtain a Key Item elswhere in this chapter, Black Loong is one of four Loong Dragons that can be defeated to earn powerful weapon crafting materials.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Black_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Black Loong'.
The content is as follows:
Black Loong is an optional secret Yaoguai King boss fight that you can encounter in Chapter 2 of Black Myth Wukong. Hidden beyond a waterfall of sand in the Fright Cliff, you won't be able to encounter this boss until you obtain a Key Item elswhere in this chapter, Black Loong is one of four Loong Dragons that can be defeated to earn powerful weapon crafting materials.
